lyrics.text: Listen 76, April Fool's Day. First listen and then answer the question. What was the joke?
lyrics.translation: 听第76段，愚人节。首先听录音，然后回答问题。这个笑话是什么？

lyrics.text: To end our special news bulletin, said the voice of the television announcer, we are going over to the macaroni fields of Calabria.
lyrics.translation: 为了结束我们的特别新闻简报，电视播音员的声音说道，我们将前往卡拉布里亚的通心粉田。

lyrics.text: Macaroni has been grown in this area for over 600 years. Two of the leading growers, Giuseppe Moldova and Riccardo Bravante, tell me that they have been expecting a splendid crop this year and harvesting has begun earlier than usual.
lyrics.translation: 在这个地区，种植通心粉已经超过600年了。两位主要种植者，朱塞佩·摩尔多瓦和里卡多·布拉万特告诉我，他们预计今年将获得一个丰收，并且收割比往年开始得更早。

lyrics.text: Here you can see two workers who between them have just finished cutting three cartloads of golden brown macaroni stalks.
lyrics.translation: 在这里，你可以看到两名工人刚刚完成了切割三车金黄色的通心粉秸秆。

lyrics.text: The whole village has been working day and night gathering and threshing this year's crop before the September rains. On the right you can see Mrs. Bravante herself. She has been helping her husband for 30 years now. Mrs. Bravante is talking to the manager of the local factory where the crop is processed.
lyrics.translation: 整个村庄的人们一直在日以继夜地工作，赶在九月的雨季来临之前收集和打谷今年的庄稼。在右边你可以看到布拉万特夫人本人。她已经帮助她的丈夫30年了。布拉万特夫人正在和当地工厂的经理交谈，庄稼就是在那里加工的。

lyrics.text: This last scene shows you what will happen at the end of the harvest. The famous Calabrian macaroni eating competition. Signor Fratelli, the present champion, has won it every year since 1991.
lyrics.translation: 这一幕展示了在收获结束时将发生的事情。著名的卡拉布里亚吃通心面比赛。现任冠军弗拉特利先生自1991年以来每年都赢得了比赛。

lyrics.text: And that ends our special bulletin for today, Thursday, April the 1st. We're now going back to the studio.
lyrics.translation: 今天的特别新闻报道到此结束，今天是星期四，4月1日。我们现在将返回演播室。
